videos.headline: Ball State scores on opening drive behind Steele's TD
videos.description: Carson Steele powers into the end zone for the 9-yard touchdown to get Ball State on the board.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Ball State scores on opening drive behind Steele's TD) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Daniel Richardson airs out a 47-yard pass for a Chippewas' TD
videos.description: Daniel Richardson drops in a 47-yard pass to JaCorey Sullivan for the touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Daniel Richardson airs out a 47-yard pass for a Chippewas' TD) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Simmons tightropes the sideline for a 43-yard Chippewas' TD
videos.description: Remi Simmons turns on the jets for the 43-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Simmons tightropes the sideline for a 43-yard Chippewas' TD) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lew Nichols burns Ball State's D with 66-yard TD
videos.description: Lew Nichols III breaks tackles to make a 66-yard house call for Central Michigan.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Lew Nichols burns Ball State's D with 66-yard TD) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Yo'heinz Tyler makes the grab for 6-yard Receiving touchdown
videos.description: Yo'heinz Tyler makes the grab for 6-yard Receiving touchdown

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Yo'heinz Tyler makes the grab for 6-yard Receiving touchdown) 2021/11/18 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lew Nichols punches in his third TD to help the Chippewas win
videos.description: Lew Nichols III notches his third touchdown of the game on a 1-yard dive into the end zone.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Lew Nichols punches in his third TD to help the Chippewas win) 2021/11/18 ESHEET
